CustomField.description: This field is used only to trigger Zapier updates on a lead. Zapier has a "Trigger on Field Updated on Record" feature, than can then be used to update a lead with certain values. That Zapier flow should always end by setting "Zapier Flag" to "True" and this field, "Zapier Trigger Field" to "False".
